mapper.select: -- retrieveAttchFilInfo 조회요청 리스트 조회 select a.muag_ATTC_FIL_ID as muagAttcFilId ,a.dpl_ATTC_FIL_ID as dplAttcFilId ,a.nrm_ATTC_FIL_ID as nrmAttcFilId from iris_knld_LeasHous_attch_fil a
mapper.insert: -- insertLeashousattchfil 필수첨부파일 등록 insert into iris_knld_LeasHous_attch_fil (muag_ATTC_FIL_ID, dpl_ATTC_FIL_ID, nrm_ATTC_FIL_ID, FRST_RGST_DT, FRST_RGST_ID, LAST_MDFY_DT, LAST_MDFY_ID ) values (#{muagAttcFilId}, #{dplAttcFilId}, #{nrmAttcFilId}, getdate(), #{userId}, getdate(), #{userId} )
